tool_description: Get Your Unique ID and start using the API.
name: Farmonaut Satellite and Weather Data
title: Farmonaut Satellite and Weather Data

api_list.name: Remove Report Language
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://farmonaut-satellite-and-weather-data1.p.rapidapi.com/removeReportLanguage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farmonaut-satellite-and-weather-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farmonaut-satellite-and-weather-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
